message.content: {"given_definition_quality":75,"better_definition":"New Year","sentence":"新年来了。","image_prompt":"An animated soft apocalypse scene of two children in simple clothes, happily celebrating as the sun rises over old rooftops. One child holds a red paper '新年' (New Year) sign. The background is warm and slightly surreal, with gentle cracks in buildings, faded lanterns hanging, and soft light filtering through mist. The mood is hopeful and gentle despite signs of dereliction. Style: animated, dreamy colors, soft edges, subtle ruin, focus on the '新年' sign.","sentence_translation":"The New Year has come."}
